item.description:
Brattleboro's first Jelly Friday July 24th!:
http://wiki.workatjel...

* Who: Hosted by Marlboro College Graduate School. Contact: Caleb, Academic Tech (Bio)."cclark at marlboro dot edu"
* What: Jelly is an informal co-work gathering for laptop baring folks. It's a chance to get out of the home office, still get some work done, but also meet new people, brainstorm, network and see what other people are working on and the tools they are using. There are no presentations, round robins, or name tags - not that there's anything wrong with that. More Info: workatjelly.com and this blog post
* When: Friday July 24th, 10am-5pm.
* Where: Marlboro College Graduate School, Room #2 East (on the river!): 28 Vernon St. Brattleboro, VT. 05301. Map | Text Directions. Big room bright classroom, big tables, wireless. See photo "2 East" here. Walk to cool Brattleboro Food Coop for lunch, or into downtown Mocha Joes, Amy's bakery, about a block a away. Coffee and water provided.
* Sign up on the Bratt Jelly's page.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Jelly In Brattleboro, VT at Marlboro College Grad Center
